results.title: Reduction of ventricular arrhythmias by atenolol.
results.text_hl: ...The effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on @DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@ventricular arrhythmias@@@ were evaluated in 25 @SPECIES_9606 @@@men@@@ with significant @<m>DISEASE_Andersen_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050030 @@@ventricular ectopy@@@.

citations.NLM: Heng MK, Zimmer I. Reduction of ventricular arrhythmias by atenolol. Am Heart J. 1985 Jun;109(6):1273-80. PMID: 4003239

results.title: Effect of atenolol on heart rate, arrhythmias, blood pressure, and dynamic left ventricular outflow tract obstruction in cats with subclinical hypertrophic cardiomyopathy.
results.text_hl: The systolic blood pressure did not change (mean pre-treatment 130 mmHg +- 16 mmHg, mean post-treatment 123 mmHg +- 20 mmHg, p = 0.2). CONCLUSION: @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ decreases HR, @DISEASE_Heart_Murmurs @DISEASE_MESH:D006337 @@@murmur@@@ grade, and @DISEASE_Ventricular_Outflow_Obstruction_Left @DISEASE_MESH:D000092242 @@@LVOT obstruction@@@, and to a lesser degree, frequency of @<m>DISEASE_Andersen_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050030 @@@ventricular ectopy@@@, in @SPECIES_9685 @@@cats@@@ with subclinical @DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Hypertrophic @DISEASE_MESH:D002312 @@@HCM@@@.

citations.NLM: Jackson BL, Adin DB, Lehmkuhl LB. Effect of atenolol on heart rate, arrhythmias, blood pressure, and dynamic left ventricular outflow tract obstruction in cats with subclinical hypertrophic cardiomyopathy. J Vet Cardiol. 2015 Dec;17 Suppl 1():S296-305. PMID: 26776587
